author: Tino Hermida
title: Carlos Viéitez proxecta a creación dun bosque de ribeira a beiras do río Chanca - Faro de Vigo
text: El Concello de Meaño dedicará una partida de 75.000 euros a la compra de terrenos en las inmediaciones del río Chanca, en el tramo que discurre entre la PO-550 a su paso por Ponte Dena y la ensenada de Os Pasales, donde desemboca el curso fluvial. Una decisión que se adoptaba en el último pleno a través de una modificación de crédito por la que se acordaba inyectar al actual presupuesto la cuantía de los 75.000 citados para tal fin. Será la mayor compra de las tres efectuadas en este paraje en lo que va de década. La adquisición, explicaba el regidor, viene motivada por el proyecto de plantar árboles en la zona y crear así un pequeño bosque de ribera. Se comprarán para ello cuatro parcelas, que suman un total 7.500 metros y que se adquieren al precio de 10 euros/m2. La superficie en cuestión responde a terrenos rústicos enclavados en zona afectada como protección de espacios naturales. Desde la oposición, Cristina Castro (MI) y Rosana Domínguez (BNG) recriminaron al regidor la falta de previsión a la hora de diseñar los presupuestos y no contemplar una partida así de cuantiosa para afrontar un proyecto que debería ser fruto de una planificación. Añadido, la independiente hizo alusión a un informe de la secretaria en el que, según la edil, se advertía del riesgo de poner en peligro la estabilidad presupuestaria del Concello en el plano económico, por cuanto responde a una inversión que se acometerá en base a fondos municipales del remanente de tesorería. A la hora de votar esta compra de terrenos, se abstuvo el BNG, mientras que los tres ediles de MI se posicionaron en contra al entender que “consideramos excesivo invertir 75.000 euros para comprar terrenos en los que plantar exclusivamente árboles” en relación a un municipio de por sí rural. La independiente lamentaba en FARO DE VIGO la diferente vara de medir en la adquisiciones de terrenos: “El Concello compró a 8 euros el metro cuadrado de terrenos en Meaño aptos de poder urbanizarse y poder construir en ellos un multiusos y, en cambio, se pagan a 10 euros en Dena terrenos de protección que no sirven para urbanizar”. El proyecto del grupo de gobierno completa actuaciones anteriores en este mismo paraje, no en vano ya había adquirido terrenos. Así, una parte, en 2021, compró dos parcelas, de 2.068 metros cuadrados y 716 metros cuadrados que supusiera entonces un desembolso de 27.160 euros; y de otra, en 2022, la compra de 2.251 m2 más, por un montante de 22.510 euros, compras de suelo todas ellas también sufragadas en base a fondo municipales. Del culminar estar tercera actuación, el concello pasaría a contar en este paraje con un total de 12.535 metros cuadrados, lo que se traducirá, a la postre, en un desembolso global de 124.670 euros. El objetivo de este conjunto de actuaciones es poner en valor es espacio natural en el entorno de la desembocadura del río Chanca.

author: Katelyn Mulcahy
title: Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers | News | djournal.com
text:
Kawhi Leonard of the Los Angeles Clippers drives to the basket against Isaac Okoro in the Clippers' NBA victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers
- Katelyn Mulcahy
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
Kawhi Leonard scored 33 points and Ivica Zubac added 28 on his 28th birthday on Tuesday as the Los Angeles Clippers rallied to hand the NBA-leading Cleveland Cavaliers a second straight defeat, 132-119.

author: Little Apple Post
title: Hunt family donates toward relief efforts after deadly Texas floods - NewsBreak
text:
Kansas City, Kansas
Hunt family donates toward relief efforts after deadly Texas floods
3 hours ago
KANSAS CITY —The owner of the Kansas City Chiefs is making a financial contribution toward the relief efforts following the deadly flooding in Texas. In a statement released Wednesday through the MLS club the Hunt family owns, FC Dallas, Hunt said donations will be directed toward both immediate disaster response and long-term care.

author: BOL
title: Noruega emite busca internacional por pessoa ligada a explosão de pagers - Notícias - BOL
text:
Noruega emite busca internacional por pessoa ligada a explosão de pagers 26/09/2024 19h57
OSLO (Reuters) - A polícia norueguesa emitiu um pedido internacional de busca contra Rinson Jose, um homem norueguês-indiano ligado à venda de pagers ao grupo militante libanês Hezbollah que explodiram na semana passada, disse a corporação nesta quinta-feira. Jose, de 39 anos, desapareceu durante uma viagem de trabalho aos Estados Unidos na semana passada. Ele é fundador de uma empresa búlgara que supostamente é parte da cadeia de suprimentos dos pagers. Questionada sobre o que está sendo feito para encontrar Jose, a polícia respondeu à Reuters por email: "Ontem, 25 de setembro, a polícia de Oslo recebeu um relato de pessoa desaparecida, ligada ao caso do pager". "Um caso de pessoas desaparecidas foi aberto, e emitimos um pedido internacional de busca para a pessoa", acrescentou. A Kripos, a polícia criminal da Noruega que administra os pedidos internacionais, confirmou à Reuters que o pedido foi feito, mas se negou a fornecer detalhes. Quando uma pessoa está desaparecida no exterior, a Kripos normalmente emite um alerta global, mas também pode contatar seus pares internacionais diretamente, dependendo das circunstâncias, havia dito anteriormente seu porta-voz à Reuters. A Interpol não estava imediatamente disponível para comentar o caso. Quando foi encontrado por telefone na semana passada, Jose se negou a comentar sobre os pagers. Ele desligou quando foi perguntado sobre seu negócio na Bulgária e, então, não respondeu mais às chamadas ou mensagens de texto. A empresa que emprega Jose na Noruega, o DN Media Group, afirmou que ele foi a uma conferência em Boston no dia 17 de setembro, e que não consegue contato com ele desde o dia 18. Ele trabalha no departamento de vendas. Segundo registros corporativos da Bulgária, Jose fundou a Norta Global Ltd, com sede em Sófia, em 2022. O país está investigando o papel da empresa no fornecimento de pagers com armadilhas internas, mas não encontrou evidências de que eles foram fabricados ou exportados a partir do país. Em um período de dois dias na semana passada, milhares de pagers e walkie-talkies usados por membros do Hezbollah explodiram no Líbano, matando 39 pessoas e ferindo milhares. Acredita-se que Israel tenha realizado o ataque, mas o país não confirmou nem negou seu envolvimento. (Reportagem de Nerijus Adomaitis)

author: David Bell
title: Calgary school hoping to get bums in new theatre seats with ambitious campaign | CBC News
text:
A Calgary school isn't waiting for the province to step up any longer and hopes to fundraise its own theatre seating renewal project.
A drama teacher says the seating at Bowness High School has been well used over the years.
"We do a ton of shows here a year," Gillian Exley told reporters at a Thursday event.
"Everything from band, to drama, to musical theatre, to dance, to a ton of community events."
But that popularity, comes with a price.
"The seats, like a lot of other things, are super expensive. They date back to the 1980s and they are a really expensive thing that we've not been able to upgrade and they have just fallen into decline."
Gillian Exley is a drama teacher at Bowness High School in Calgary. Exlay says the old seats in the school theatre are in decline. (Taylor Braat/CBC) The school has asked for help from the province but so far no luck.
But lucky is how one student describes drama students at the northwest school.
"I think we are really lucky to have a theatre that is this big and gorgeous," said Charlotte Hamilton.
"Definitely the seats could use a bit of an upgrade, but it's still a lovely theatre and I think we are really lucky to have it."
Charlotte Hamilton is a Grade 11 student at Bowness High School in Calgary. She says students feel lucky to have the theatre. (Taylor Braat/CBC) Jesse Peters has a son at the school and the arts programs really takes him back.
"I think a facility like this is just so important to students. When I was coming up, I worked as a full-time musician and my whole career has been in the arts," Peters explained.
"That love was fostered in an environment like this. Kids having this kind of access to this kind of facility in their school matters. This is where kids learn how to execute a vision, how to perform under pressure. All sorts of skills that are good later in life happen in this type of environment."
The Calgary Board of Education (CBE) says times are tough.
"Bowness High School has undergone extensive modernizations and renovations in the past decade. However, with finite resources, we have been unable to dedicate funds to a theatre upgrade in the building," a spokesperson wrote in an emailed response to CBC News.
"Much like how school playgrounds are replaced, the parent community can work to procure funds for special projects through local fundraising, as well as community and provincial grants. Once in place, the CBE is responsible for maintenance and upkeep."
Meanwhile, for Charlotte Hamilton, drama can be about lifelong connections.
"Drama is everything," she said with a smile.
"I come here and I make amazing friends that I probably wouldn't see otherwise. When you are in drama, you have to be so vulnerable with everyone, and that just makes connections that last for so long."
And those connections don't end at graduation.
"If I've been in a performance with someone, it could be three years later and I could see them on a random street, and still notice them and have a lovely conversation because we know each other so well because we've had a shared experience."
The Save a Seat, Leave a Legacy campaign has raised $1,830 of its $150,000 goal with a deadline of next June.

author: AFP
title: Allemagne: les salariés de Volkswagen appelés à la grève à partir de lundi (syndicat) - 01/12/2024 à 12:55 - Boursorama
text:
Logo du constructeur automobile allemand Volkswagen, lors du salon de l'automobile à Paris, le 16 octobre 2024 ( AFP / JULIEN DE ROSA )
Les salariés de Volkswagen sont appelés à cesser le travail à partir de lundi dans les usines allemandes pour s'opposer aux milliers de suppressions d'emplois envisagées, a annoncé dimanche le syndicat IG Metall.
"Si nécessaire, ce sera la bataille de négociation collective la plus dure que Volkswagen ait jamais connue", prévient dans un communiqué le négociateur du syndicat, Thorsten Gröger, à l'issue de la période de dialogue social obligatoire pour 120.000 employés de la marque en Allemagne.
Vendredi, le constructeur, qui prépare un plan drastique d'économies, avait rejeté une contre-proposition syndicale visant à réduire les coûts sans avoir à fermer d'usines en Allemagne, laissant augurer d'un durcissement du dialogue social.
"Des grèves d'avertissement commenceront lundi dans toutes les usines", indique M. Gröger, qui tient la direction "responsable, à la table des négociations, de la durée et de l'intensité de cet affrontement".
Dans un communiqué séparé, Volkswagen a dit "respecter" le droit des salariés à participer à une grève d'avertissement" et dit croire en la poursuite d'un "dialogue constructif" pour "parvenir à une solution durable et soutenue collectivement".
L'entreprise précise avoir "anticipé des mesures ciblées pour sécuriser l'approvisionnement d'urgence" pendant le mouvement, et ce afin de "limiter autant que possible" son impact "sur nos clients, nos partenaires et nos installations industrielles".
Alors que Volkswagen a annoncé en septembre travailler sur un programme pour redresser sa compétitivité, les discussions en cours entre la direction et les responsables syndicaux, en vertu du principe de cogestion, n'ont pas permis de trouver d'accord sur les mesures de restructuration.
Les représentants des salariés avaient présenté en novembre une contre-proposition incluant la suspension de bonus, d'augmentations de salaires, un allègement du temps de travail, permettant, selon eux, d'éviter fermetures d'usines en Allemagne et licenciements en masse.
Mais cette offre n'a pas été jugée viable par la direction.
Les représentants du personnel affirment qu'au moins trois usines Volkswagen risquent de fermer en Allemagne et que des dizaines de milliers d'emplois pourraient être supprimés, les employés restants devant consentir à des réductions de salaire.
Dans le pays, Volkswagen compte dix sites de production de voitures et environ 300.000 salariés, dont 120.000 pour la marque VW, la plus concernée par le plan d'économies.
Fleuron de l'industrie automobile allemande, Volkswagen souffre à la fois du ralentissement du marché des véhicules neufs, de la concurrence chinoise, de modèles à batterie pas assez attractifs, et de coûts de main d’œuvre plus élevés que ses rivaux, selon les experts.
